Literature Review: The SWI/SNF complex plays a crucial role in regulating chromatin structure and gene expression during neural crest cell development and disease. Recent studies have highlighted the importance of the BAF and PBAF complexes in neural crest specification and the pathogenesis of neural crest-derived tumors. This review aims to summarize the current understanding of the SWI/SNF complex in neural crest cell development and disease, with a focus on the roles of Smarcb1 and NF2 in regulating neural crest cell fate and tumorigenesis.
